backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a turf booking system with CRUD operations for time slots â€” supports adding, booking, cancelling, deleting, and querying slots sorted by date/time.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three completed features (correct business address, phone numbers, and email updates) to their affected frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's React/Tailwind frontend.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Green Pitch Turf', mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home (/), Booking (/booking), and Admin (/admin), all wrapped in the Layout component with a Sonner Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AdminSlotTable.t: Admin table component that displays all booking slots with date, time, status, booker info, and action buttons for cancelling or deleting slots with loading state support.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Dialog modal component for booking a slot that collects and validates a user's name and phone number before calling the onBook callback.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with a sticky header (logo, desktop/mobile nav), main content area, and footer for the Green Pitch Turf booking app.
frontend/src/components/SlotCard.tsx: Renders a single booking slot card showing time range, availability status, booker details, and Book/Cancel action buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for all backend operations: fetching all/available slots, and mutations for adding, booking, cancelling, and deleting slots.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing fonts and defining Tailwind CSS base styles, OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the brand color system (light/dark modes), and utility classes for turf/gold colors and gradients.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Utility functions for converting between JavaScript Dates and nanosecond bigints (used by the ICP backend), plus formatting helpers for dates, times, and date keys.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin panel page that allows adding new booking slots (with date/time form validation) and lists all existing slots with options to delete slots or cancel bookings, using React Query mutations and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Booking.tsx: Public booking page that fetches and displays all slots grouped by date, allowing users to book an available slot via a modal (name/phone input) or cancel an existing booking.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing/home page for Green Pitch Turf featuring a hero banner, features grid, stats section, and contact/location info with navigation links to the booking page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens including brand colors (gold, turf variants), fonts (Oswald, Inter), border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the sports-themed UI.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking schema version, implemented features, architectural notes, and business details (address, phone numbers, email) for the Green Pitch Turf booking website.
